fullplot: A rash of bizarre murders in New York City seems to point to a group of grotesquely deformed vagrants living in the sewers. A courageous policeman, a photo journalist and his girlfriend, and a nutty bum, who seems to know a lot about the creatures, band together to try and determine what the creatures are and how to stop them.
plot: A bizarre series of murders in New York City seems to point toward the existence of a race of mutant cannibals living under the streets.
title: C.H.U.D.
